definition: short name for Liaoning 遼寧|辽宁[Liao2 ning2] province/Liao or Khitan dynasty (907-1125)
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: The vast ground remained silent, and nobody was going to give me an answer.
sentences.chinese: 遼遠的天地沉默着，沒有人肯給我答案。

sentences.english: He dreiwimed of traveling to remote South Sea Islands.
sentences.chinese: 他曾理想到遼遠的南海諸島去旅遊。

sentences.english: To hear immense night, still more immense without her.
sentences.chinese: 聆聽這遼遠，且更遼遠的夜，因爲沒有了她。

sentences.english: To hear immense night, still more immense without her.
sentences.chinese: 聆聽這遼遠，且更遼遠的夜，因爲沒有了她。

sentences.english: He lives in faraway mountain villgrowing older.
sentences.chinese: 他住在一個遼遠的小山村。
